title: TOO HOT TO HANDLE Season 2 Is Back and WORSE Than Ever!
author: Think Story
comment:
🔥 It's been awhile since I did a reality show review! This is going to be one hell of a surprise for those who subbed because of my LUCA video 😂

Season 1 Video: https://youtu.be/Ae4OMzMr3bk
The fact that Mel and Marvin broke up after filming and she ended up with PETER has completely made my day 🤣
The cockroach on Chase's forehead had me laughing for days
I like this cast… maybe because I think Melinda is gorgeous. Her infatuation with Marvin pissed me off though. 😭
We can all agree that Chase was the worst.
description:
Too Hot To Handle Season 2 is Netflix's crazy reality dating show where *** is forbidden. Follow me as we take a deep dive into the show and have a good laugh.
